about_the_game:
The Develry Reservation is a place of exile and residence of various representatives of the paranormal part of the population, most of which are monsters of varying degrees of danger. Such reservations hide from ordinary people and are kept under the supervision of government organizations.

The player will take on the role of a Paranormal Security Service detective, whose goal is to solve the issues of hooliganism of one of these reservations. Complicating the investigation process is the fact that the tenants are unfriendly and unwilling to help the investigation. Each of them is a unique personality, and your task will be to choose your own approach to each tenant. You will fulfill the quests of the residents to gain confidence, or use your status as a policeman to get the necessary information.

The main character is one of the few PSS agents who are not human. He is the same evil spirits as the inhabitants of the reservations, but unlike other demons, he has superpowers useful in investigations. Person like him are called Faceless. Rare creatures that do not have a face, but communicate using telepathy.

You have to explore the apartments of a multi-storey panel house and talk to evil spirits, getting new information. This will help you uncover the true state of affairs in the reservation, as well as learn a lot about the structure of the world of evil spirits.

GAMEPLAY


A leisurely journey of exploration awaits you. The side view game with pixel graphics allows you to move around a multi-storey house. The study of the environment and interaction with the characters is carried out using a text narrative and a dialog selection system.

You need to solve all the tasks and simultaneously study the local evil spirits. A Personal Digital Assistant will help you with this. PDA is able to scan evil spirits, and also stores useful information for the case.

short_description: Take on the role of a faceless detective dealing with characters from Slavic folklore. In this detective story filled with post-Soviet aesthetics, mystique, and humor, you'll encounter puzzles, mini-games, solving everyday problems, and something more ominous.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, German, Japanese, Danish, Norwegian, Finnish, Swedish
